price: 9. Allah heeft degenen die geloven en goede daden verrichten beloofd dat er voor hen vergiffenis is en een grote beloning.
arabic: وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: waʿada al-lahu alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun ʿaẓīmun
